verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Al-tashheth. A Psalm of David. Michtam; when Saul sent, and they watched the house to kill him. <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>: Set me on <S%H7682>high<s%> from them that rise up against <S%H6965>me<s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, And <S%H3467>save<s%> me from the <S%H1818>bloodthirsty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>.

For <S%H693><s%>, lo, they lie in wait for my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; The <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H1481>gather<s%> themselves together against <S%H6588>me<s%>: Not for my transgression, nor for my <S%H2403>sin<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
They <S%H7323>run<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> themselves without my <S%H5771>fault<s%>: <S%H5782>Awake<s%> thou to <S%H7125>help<s%> <S%H7200>me<s%>, and behold.

Even <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H6974>Arise<s%> to <S%H6485>visit<s%> all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: Be not <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to any <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H898>transgressors<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
They <S%H7725>return<s%> at <S%H6153>evening<s%>, they <S%H1993>howl<s%> like a <S%H3611>dog<s%>, And go round <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
Behold <S%H5042><s%>, they belch out with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; <S%H2719>Swords<s%> are in their <S%H8193>lips<s%>: For <S%H8085>who<s%>, say they, doth hear?
But <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, wilt <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at <S%H1471>them<s%>; Thou wilt have all the nations in <S%H3932>derision<s%>.
Because of his <S%H5797>strength<s%> I will give <S%H8104>heed<s%> unto <S%H430>thee<s%>; For God is my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>.
My <S%H430>God<s%> with his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will <S%H6923>meet<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>: God will let me <S%H7200>see<s%> my desire upon mine <S%H8324>enemies<s%>.

Slay <S%H2026><s%> them <S%H5971>not<s%>, lest my people <S%H7911>forget<s%>: <S%H5128>Scatter<s%> them by thy <S%H2428>power<s%>, and bring them <S%H3381>down<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H4043>shield<s%>.

For the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of their <S%H8193>lips<s%>, Let them even be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in their <S%H1347>pride<s%>, And for <S%H423>cursing<s%> and <S%H3585>lying<s%> which they <S%H5608>speak<s%>.

Consume <S%H3615><s%> them in <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, <S%H3615>consume<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>, so that they shall be no more: And let them know that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Unto the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
And at <S%H6153>evening<s%> let them <S%H7725>return<s%>, let them <S%H1993>howl<s%> like a <S%H3611>dog<s%>, And go round <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
They shall wander up and <S%H5128>down<s%> for <S%H398>food<s%>, And <S%H3885>tarry<s%> all night if they be not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>.

But I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>; <S%H7442>Yea<s%>, I will sing aloud of thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: For thou hast been my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>, And a <S%H4498>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6862>distress<s%>.
Unto <S%H5797>thee<s%>, O my strength, will I <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H430>praises<s%>: For God is my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H2617>mercy<s%>.
